data.name: Boomer
data.detailed_description:
Help Boomer dash and float through this precision platformer above the clouds. Collect fragments to unlock shrines and rebuild his world. Unlock secrets and piece together an adventure through bright, colorful and an inspiring pixel art alongside a gorgeous 8-Bit Synth Soundtrack.

  • Dash & Float mechanics
  • 8-Bit Inspired Soundtrack
  • Bright and beautiful pixel art landscape
  • Challenging hand-crafted levels
  • Precision Platforming

Simple mechanics of dashing and floating that use the same stamina bar. Combine the mechanics to complete challenges.

Artifacts - Collect missing artifacts to unlock portals


Portals - unlock portals to continue your quest


Dash & Inflate - Manage your stamina as you use both of these mechanics to navigate between floating islands and hazards
